About.paragraph:
Casa Carmela is a labor of love, hand-built years ago by Nonno Gaetano and proudly owned by the Mandara and Guida families. With deep roots in the Amalfi Coast, we are passionate about sharing our home and local traditions with you.

Our family of fourâ€”Carmela, Francesco, Angelo, and Mariaâ€”welcome you to experience the warmth and authenticity of our heritage. Whether guiding you to the best local restaurants, hidden beaches, or artisan shops, we are here to make your stay unforgettable.

Testimonials.text: "Thank you ! You exceeded all our expectations for myself and my two sons! This is a newer property which had little to no reviews. I took a chance on it and it was the best decision ever. this property has been completely renovated.. full kitchen .. wonderful showers.. state of the art tech.. was absolutely beautiful! The owners arranged our cars from Naples for us.. met us there on arrival. She even had a welcome letter and these beautiful artisan treats that she made for us! The location is perfect! close to a fresh market we could walk to and cook breakfast.. walking distance to restaurants and the main shopping areas. The view is breathtaking! It as three separate bedrooms full kitchen .. laundry.. WiFi .. everything! Do not waste your time looking for another property to stay in . Book this now ! Many thanks to the landlord for his hospitality! We hope to be back again!"
Testimonials.name: Al
